hackathon-description-text: Hackathons are all about taking something you love, combining it with tech and learning something in the process. Junction brings together hackers, designers, the best partners and hardware for one weekend of hacking. Charge your laptops and bring your friends for an amazing event. Let's hack!
hackathon-rules:
All hackers must be present at Junction.
You must also follow the Major League Hacking 
.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Take part in any other challenge and use features from the Azure Cloud to win 10 000€. You can use any technologies (Windows, Linux, Node.JS, Python, ASP.NET, PHP etc.) The winner will be chosen out of all teams from Junction and Ultrahack based on who brings the most value to their case leveraging Azure.
400€ Gift Card to Amazon.com
First prize: Flights and tickets to Slush Japan
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Future of Air Travel Track Main Prize

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 5x AKG K550 Headphones

1st prize: The winning team will be awarded with a visit to an international IBM innovation center/lab, including demonstrations of cognitive computing by IBM Watson. The prize includes travel and accommodation costs up to 1000eur, 2nd prize: Oura Rings
FutuLabs starter pack including gadgets, chilicorns, and more.
A trip to the Uber Amsterdam office to spend a day with the Uber engineering team.
3 x Self-balancing electric scooters
One Solu Computer
Aaltoes hoodies. Jugded by the Aaltoes team.
5 x 100€ Gift Card to Amazon.com
1x GoPro Hero 4 Silver raffled from all hacks that used the IBM Bluemix platform.

The Coolest demos will be showcased on a tram stop next to the central railway station in Helsinki on Monday the 9th of November. And the winner team will catch 3,6 million eye-contacts with our digital panels in the heart of Helsinki. We will give a week long digital out of home campaign for the winner.
Beddit devices
$5000 in UpCloud credit + $1000 for Airbnb or Uber
5 Rasberry Pi 2 Model B
GoPro 4 Silver + Walkera QR X350 Drone + Trip to Futurice Berlin office. Go Pro 4 silver for second place.
1 x Harman Kardon Omni 10
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Hack Using the MixRadio API

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The best 3D print created during Junction will be launched into space with a weather balloon. The flight will be filmed and the video published online!
1 x Dji Phantom 3 Standard and 1 x My PowerTrekk.
